thread.title: How much RAM in new iOS devices?
thread.title_full: How much RAM in new iOS devices?

author: Hadlee Simons
title: How much RAM in new iOS devices?
text:
Are you covered? Compare quotes for car, life and business insurance right now! 
Sign up for your free fax number and get faxes sent to your inbox! How much RAM in new iOS devices? Article By: Hadlee Simons Tue, 15 Sep 2015 11:49 AM Share The Apple iPhone 6S. 
Apple is notoriously tight-lipped when it comes to specifications of its iOS devices. 
Sure, it'll tell you resolutions and processor types, but don't expect the company to tell you how much RAM it devices sport. 
However, people have their ways of finding out... 
For instance, last year's iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus sported "just" 1GB of RAM, as evident by a teardown of said handsets. 
Now, someone else has discovered just what kind of heat the iPhone 6S is packing. 
A developer has crafted a demo app using an Xcode simulator that tells you just how much the iPhone 6S and 6S Plus are packing. And the result is a bump to 2GBs of RAM for both handsets. 
Interestingly enough, the new iPad Pro possesses 4GBs of RAM according to the app, Ars Technica reported. Read More
